description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. In this fast action infinite shooter, four turrets seeking thrills encounter a young horde in the desert. After dispatching their infantry, they begin scheming on a crippled old mollusk, reputedly hiding a tidy sum of cash. They become houseguests of the mollusk, not realizing the old mollusk has a few sinister intentions of his own.
